comment: Template configuration file - Copy to organizer_config.json and customize

drives.MAIN_DRIVE: UNCONFIGURED - Set this to your main drive path (e.g., /Users/yourname)
drives.GOOGLE_DRIVE: UNCONFIGURED - Set this to your Google Drive path (e.g., /Users/yourname/Google Drive)
drives.PROTON_DRIVE: UNCONFIGURED - Set this to your ProtonDrive path (e.g., /Users/yourname/ProtonDrive)
drives.EXTERNAL_DRIVE: UNCONFIGURED - Set this to your external drive path (e.g., /Volumes/YourDrive)

sync_pairs.comment: Example: Keep local copy in sync with Google Drive
